attributes.action: House of Commons to discuss the actions they will take on the Muslims in camps
attributes.additional_details: Please watch this video if you are in denial of the massacre and the modern day HOLOCAUST going on in china. They are humans too.
attributes.background: There are peoples families, children and parents  in camps who are being tortured for having belief and having a sense of religion. The UK have the capability to help the Jews escape but they can’t help the Muslims? They are being tortured and killed. I want change and i am willing to do anything.

rejection.details:
We think that this petition is similar: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/234849
